Organics:
 
Organics sighed and got up out of her seat.  She grabbed Malice's disruptor rifle, she would put it in his quarters.  She turned and faced Ydrassil.
"Let's go find an empty room then."

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Ydrassil:

"Don't worry.." said kindly the male "I bet thatn we still have 
empty quarters... come let's go to search it"

<DIV>Organics:</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Organics sighed and got up out of her seat.  She grabbed Malice's disruptor rifle, she would put it in his quarters.  She turned and faced Ydrassil.</DIV>
